name: df-assintop
body: |- wceq(cassintop, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, cfv(cclintop, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), casslaw, cv(s0)))))
comment: Function mapping a set to the class of all associative (closed internal binary) operations for this set, see definition 5 in [BourbakiAlg1] p. 4, where it is called "an associative law of composition". (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2020.)
